import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Type } from 'src/app/shared/models/type'; import { TypeService } from '../type.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-type-list', templateUrl: './type-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./type-list.component.scss'] }) export class TypeListComponent implements OnInit { types: Type[] = []; constructor(private typeService: TypeService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadType(); } loadType(): void { this.typeService.getTypes().subscribe({ next: (response: any) => { console.log('API Response:', response); this.types = response; }, error: error => console.log('Error fetching books:', error) }) } }
